Description: Marl pottery vase, flat base with walls swelling to slight shoulder, with evert rolled over rim and modelled wavy design on shoulder.
Curator's comments: For excavations see E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, 'Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna' (London, 1911). Marked H.u, (a) on base, areas not mentioned in text. Type like Wavy-handle W61 in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery.
